meanings.definition: Make certain that (something) shall occur or be the case.
meanings.sent1: She is ensuring the door is locked before leaving the house.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is ensuring all students understand the lesson before moving on.
meanings.sent3: He kept ensuring the cat didn't escape by checking the windows multiple times.
meanings.sent4: The captain is like a lighthouse, ensuring the ship safely navigates through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The security guard's job is ensuring the building remains secure at all times.

meanings.sent1: Please ensure you have your keys before leaving the house.
meanings.sent2: I will ensure the document is delivered to the client on time.
meanings.sent3: The chef always ensures the ingredients are fresh for the best taste.
meanings.sent4: The detective is like a bloodhound, ensuring no clue goes unnoticed.
meanings.sent5: The pilot's main responsibility is ensuring the safety of all passengers on board.
